column5: I feel this all the time. This is also the reason I have like 2 comments and no posts

This is absolutely adorable and so sweet.
Recently my boyfriend and I broke up, but this made me think of how he would sometimes do things like that. One thing he would do was he would always hold my hand to show that he was there, no matter how bad a day he had had or how gross either of us were feeling, he would just hold my hand.
